Related Stories Hydrogen Mobility Europe to deploy more fuel cell electric vehicles plus pan-European hydrogen refueling network A coalition of European partners has launched the Hydrogen Mobility Europe (H2ME) flagship project, to deploy a total of 325 fuel cell electric vehicles and 29 new hydrogen refueling stations, creating the first pan-European network of hydrogen stations to serve FCEV drivers.
